Summary: notices light above going west hgwy 90
divs: Sighting Detailsstayed night n alpine.tx,@sisters. left @3:45a.m.,2 or 3 miles past marfa n the mountain,i notice a red blinking light thought it was a phone tower but way to high. about 1 mile away getting closer my wife notice 2 more blinking lights 3 total,at that point i stop n the middle of the road got out ande began filming, then i notice a bright streak to the left of the lights hovering.the streak gave out a bright light that i thought showed a crome or grey body, shot straight across then started to shoot up then disappeared.I comment it on video then continued to film the 3 lights.after 2 minutes or so,i drove further down hgwy 90 until i was almost under it.i continue to capture these lights for about 5 to 10 minutes until the border patrol question us and force us to move on with an escort.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Marfa
There were no other sightings in Marfa on or around April 30th 2013
